about_the_game:
While arranging the Tetris blocks on the right, you also need to manage Match 3 on the left. The overlay of two colors forms a new color. Three or more of the same color in horizontal and vertical line complete the matching. If you fail to find the matching in a certain number of steps, you will be punished. The punishment will increase, and it could grow too big for you to bear!

If this is just the beginning, then use your extraordinary brain to challenge greater difficulties: Work out color-mix yourself; Tetris blocks no longer static; Some levels of Tetris blocks are covered.

Try to match the flashing diamond that may appear at some time, and you can get some useful tools.

ASDW controls the direction, QE rotates, and the space bar settes the block. Game controller or joystick can be used, but it requires configuration.
